attributes.action: Address the actual issues underpinning pupils  teaching and learning in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Understand and address the physical and biological factors which constrain effective teaching and learning.

Define a MAXIMUM class size for each Key Stage.

Hold schools and L.E.A.s to account for the number of pupils taught in practical spaces, enforce the recommendations made in DCSF Bulletin 81 rather than abbrogating responsibility.
 
Remove corridors and foyers from the calculation of the area available for teaching in schools(since these clearly are NOT available for teaching and thus these calculations result in unrealistic P.A.N.s)

Define a MAXIMUM temperature for educational establishments (perhaps in line with the W.H.O.'s recommendation of 24 degrees centigrade).

Bring the MINIMUM classroom temperature in an educational space in line with the W.H.Os recommendation of 18 degrees centigrade.

Define clearly the statutory minimum number of thermometers in teaching spaces, their locations and a schedule for their monitoring.

In all cases provide clear, unambiguous, statutory requirements.
